title.narrative: OUTPUT 5.3. ENABLING ENVIRONMENT EDUCATION

description.narrative: By end 2021, national, regional and local authorities have the knowledge and capacity to plan, coordinate, implement, monitor and evaluate implementation of the 10-year Education and Literacy Development Plan, taking into account the human rights-based approach, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change, Education â€“ General, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 5: By the end of 2022, the most vulnerable preschool and school-age children, adolescents and young people, of both sexes, in the 10 targeted provinces make greater use of inclusive, quality educational services, for improved learning outcomes and receive certification for this.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end 2021, national, regional and local authorities have the knowledge and capacity to plan, coordinate, implement, monitor andevaluate implementation of the 10-year Education and Literacy Development Plan, taking into account the human rights-based approach

description.narrative: In collaboration with other members of the Local Education Group, UNICEF supported the review and update of the Interim Education Plan in Chad. UNICEF also helped prepare for the start of the 2021/2022 school year, in particular through a communication campaign on the need to send children to school and on preventive measures against the COVID-19 pandemic. Finally, UNICEF contributed to the strengthening of planning and management systems in the education sector through the supply of equipment and the training of staff of dedicated institutions. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:23/01/2022
